contacts.name: Watson
contacts.signature: State your business, don't "You there" me

121830000.text: Seems like you've completed all the tasks assigned to you. Nice work

121830001.text: I did all the work while you did squat. Nice work indeed!

121830002.text: Hey, I helped you. If I didn't file the paperwork for you, you'd have a lot more to do

121830003.text: Aren't you assigned some other work? Now you've got the time to ask how I'm doing?

121830004.text: Someone's got a temper here, but don't forget, I was the one handling paperwork

121830005.text: FYI, you're also the only one who took the remuneration. I didn't take any

121830006.text: Finally, it was nice working with you. Much nicer than with a certain someone in the space station, at least
